description.value:
Elementalist monks bond their minds and bodies with &reference[elemental] forces. The elements permeate all things, and elementalists learn to infuse their bodies with one of four elemental attunements, switching attunements to use different powers. They are always walking in a world of extremes, and have the ability to unleash these extreme forces upon their enemies.

advancement.title: Elementalist Spells
advancement.hint:
Depending on which elemental attunement you have active, you can draw on ki to cast certain spells. These spells will now appear when you activate an elemental attunement.

Air: Thunderwave

Earth: False Life

Fire: Burning Hands

Water: Gentle Current
